tab_infos.Name: id
tab_infos.Description: The playlist's Deezer id

tab_infos.Name: title
tab_infos.Description: The playlist's title

tab_infos.Name: description
tab_infos.Description: The playlist description

tab_infos.Name: duration
tab_infos.Description: The playlist's duration (seconds)

tab_infos.Name: public
tab_infos.Description: If the playlist is public or not

tab_infos.Name: is_loved_track
tab_infos.Description: If the playlist is the love tracks playlist

tab_infos.Name: collaborative
tab_infos.Description: If the playlist is collaborative or not

tab_infos.Name: nb_tracks
tab_infos.Description: Nb tracks in the playlist

tab_infos.Name: unseen_track_count
tab_infos.Description: Nb tracks not seen

tab_infos.Name: fans
tab_infos.Description: The number of playlist's fans

tab_infos.Name: link
tab_infos.Description: The url of the playlist on Deezer

tab_infos.Name: share
tab_infos.Description: The share link of the playlist on Deezer

tab_infos.Name: picture
tab_infos.Description: The url of the playlist's cover. Add 'size' parameter to the url to change size. Can be 'small', 'medium', 'big', 'xl'

tab_infos.Name: picture_small
tab_infos.Description: The url of the playlist's cover in size small.

tab_infos.Name: picture_medium
tab_infos.Description: The url of the playlist's cover in size medium.

tab_infos.Name: picture_big
tab_infos.Description: The url of the playlist's cover in size big.

tab_infos.Name: picture_xl
tab_infos.Description: The url of the playlist's cover in size xl.

tab_infos.Name: checksum
tab_infos.Description: The checksum for the track list

tab_infos.Name: creator
tab_infos.Description: user object containing : id, name

tab_infos.Name: tracks
tab_infos.Description: list of track

tab_infos.Name: id
tab_infos.Description: The track's Deezer id

tab_infos.Name: readable
tab_infos.Description: true if the track is readable in the player for the current user

tab_infos.Name: title
tab_infos.Description: The track's fulltitle

tab_infos.Name: title_short
tab_infos.Description: The track's short title

tab_infos.Name: title_version
tab_infos.Description: The track version

tab_infos.Name: unseen
tab_infos.Description: The track unseen status

tab_infos.Name: link
tab_infos.Description: The url of the track on Deezer

tab_infos.Name: duration
tab_infos.Description: The track's duration in seconds

tab_infos.Name: rank
tab_infos.Description: The track's Deezer rank

tab_infos.Name: explicit_lyrics
tab_infos.Description: Whether the track contains explicit lyrics

tab_infos.Name: preview
tab_infos.Description: The url of track's preview file. This file contains the first 30 seconds of the track

tab_infos.Name: time_add
tab_infos.Description: The time when the track has been added to the playlist

tab_infos.Name: artist
tab_infos.Description: artist object containing : id, name, link

tab_infos.Name: album
tab_infos.Description: album object containing : id, title, cover, cover_small, cover_medium, cover_big, cover_xl

tab_connections.Name: playlist / seen
tab_connections.Description: GET method is not available. Please check POST methods.

tab_connections.Name: playlist / fans
tab_connections.Description: Return a list of playlist's fans. Represented by an array of User objects
tab_connections.Returns: A list of object of type user

tab_connections.Name: playlist / tracks
tab_connections.Description: Return a list of playlist's tracks. Represented by an array of Track object
tab_connections.Returns: A list of object of type track

tab_connections.Name: playlist / radio
tab_connections.Description: Return a list of playlist's recommendation tracks. Represented by an array of Track object
tab_connections.Returns: A list of object of type track
